original_text: That was because he was teaching his disciples. He told them, ‘Soon, they will give the Son of Man to powerful people. They will take him away and they will kill him. But three days after that, he will become alive again.’
korean_text: 이는 제자들을 가르치시며 또 인자가 사람들의 손에 넘겨져 죽임을 당하고 죽은 지 삼 일만에 살아나리라는 것을 말씀하셨기 때문이더라

sentences.original_text: That was because he was teaching his disciples.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 제자들을 가르치고 있었기 때문이었다.

sentences.original_text: Soon, they will give the Son of Man to powerful people.
sentences.korean_translation: 곧, 그들이 인자를 권력 있는 사람들에게 넘겨줄 것이다.
